verbose_text: The protein also recruits p97 to the ER membrane, and specifically, it facilities the interaction between p97 and Hrd1 (Hmg2 regulated degradation), a membrane anchored ubiquitin ligase which ubiquitinates ERAD substrates and also contains a p97 interacting VBM (VCP binding motif) [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: recruits p97 to the ER membrane
